actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend title XVI of the Social Security Act to provide for a more complete exchange of information between the Secretary of Health, Education, and Welfare and the Immigration and Naturalization Service with respect to all aliens who are applicants for or recipients of SSI benefits, and to amend section 212 of the Immigration and Nationality Act to provide for the exclusion from the United States of aliens who are determined by the Attorney General to be likely to receive such benefits within six months of their entry.

summary.text: Amends title XVI (Supplemental Security Income) of the Social Security Act to direct the Secretary of Health, Education, and Welfare and the Attorney General to establish and maintain procedures for the exchange of information with respect to aliens who are applicants for or recipients of SSI. Amends the Immigration and Nationality Act to exclude aliens from the United States who are likely to receive SSI within six months after entering the United States.

titles.title: A bill to amend title XVI of the Social Security Act to provide for a more complete exchange of information between the Secretary of Health, Education, and Welfare and the Immigration and Naturalization Service with respect to all aliens who are applicants for or recipients of SSI benefits, and to amend section 212 of the Immigration and Nationality Act to provide for the exclusion from the United States of aliens who are determined by the Attorney General to be likely to receive such benefits within six months of their entry.
